<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>4</base_damage> <critical_rating>5</critical_rating> <defense/> <description>Short, compact, and loud, these small weapons are very rare. Those who wield them frequently do so because they have some sentimental value, perhaps handed down to them from some distant relative from a low-tech world, or because these weapons are all that's easily available on their world.  Models Include: Oriolanis Striker Projectile Pistol.</description> <description_html><![CDATA[Short, compact, and loud, these small weapons are very rare. Those who wield them frequently do so because they have some sentimental value, perhaps handed down to them from some distant relative from a low-tech world, or because these weapons are all that's easily available on their world.
Models Include: Oriolanis Striker Projectile Pistol.]]></description_html> <encumbrance>1</encumbrance> <hard_points>0</hard_points> <hp_required/> <name>Slugthrower Pistol</name> <number>GEAR0001014</number> <price>100</price> <range>short</range> <rarity>3</rarity> <skill_used display_value="Ranged - Light (Ag)">d290dd5cdbae88542901de90cf9619a6</skill_used> <soak/> <sys_class_name/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 14:47:10</sys_created_on> <sys_id>eb03a6e02f10a450e0f497eef699b679</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-02-23 23:46:20</sys_updated_on> <type>weapon</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
